content:
Congratulations on your name change! Updating your social media profiles can be a bit of a process, but I'm here to guide you through it. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to change your last name on Facebook and Instagram:

**Facebook:**

1. Log in to your Facebook account on a computer or mobile device.
2. Click on the downward arrow in the top-right corner of the Facebook homepage.
3. Click on "Settings" from the dropdown menu.
4. Click on "Account Settings" from the left-hand menu.
5. Click on "Edit" next to "Name" on the General Account Settings page.
6. Enter your new last name (Thompson) in the "Last Name" field.
7. Enter your Facebook password to confirm the change.
8. Click "Save Changes."

**Instagram:**

1. Open the Instagram app on your mobile device.
2. Tap the profile icon (represented by a person) in the bottom-right corner of the screen.
3. Tap the three horizontal lines (Settings) on the top-right corner of your profile page.
4. Tap "Account" from the dropdown menu.
5. Tap "Edit Profile."
6. Tap the "Name" field and edit your last name to Thompson.
7. Tap "Done" in the top-right corner of the screen to save the changes.

**Additional Tips:**

* Make sure you're logged in to the correct account on both platforms before making the changes.
* If you're having trouble updating your name on Facebook, you might need to wait a few days and try again, as Facebook has a name change policy that may require additional verification.
* If you're using a username (e.g., @yourusername) on Instagram, you can update it separately from your display name. To do so, go to your profile, tap "Edit Profile," and then tap "Username" to update it.

That's it! Your social media profiles should now reflect your new last name, Thompson.
